message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its value to you, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both parties. My initial offer is $1300000 for the product.
Thank you for your initial offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value I can get from it.
Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and am willing to consider your offer. In light of our previous discussions, my counteroffer is $1250000 for the product.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still a bit higher on the price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1075000. I believe this is a more reasonable price for the product's value to me.

I understand your position, Bob. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a price of $1225000 for the product. This offers a compromise between our previous offers, while still reflecting the value of the product to you.

Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to compromise. However, I'm still a bit higher on the price. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1150000. I believe this is a fair price for the product's value to me.

I appreciate your continued interest, Bob. Considering our previous negotiations, I would like to propose a final offer of $1200000 for the product. This price reflects both the value of the product to you and my need to maximize the return on investment.
